comment: Like a knot coming undone, it begins to unravel from the point of contact.
Upon hearing the beast's roar, victory shall be in your grasp.
The sound of one's fellows, beating down in the bowels of the earth. This tune calls forth the dead.
Temptation takes one by the hand. Darkness is its ultimate destination.
O light of the heavens, rain down upon me as I am anointed with your blessing.
Give thanks to the gentle rain. Be grateful for the water's soothing touch.
A bountiful harvest leads to blessings. Dazzling, glittering...as you wish.
To begin, stand resolute. Take aim and bring it down.
Come, gather around. Brilliance is at your fingertips.
The shackles have fallen away, along with all peace of mind.
"Fou! Foufoufooou!!!" (Translation: Put me on a Command Card of your choice!)
"So this is the new Servant support spell...a Command Code. It's wonderful, Senpai! Putting it on a Command Card will enable a variety of effects!"
Its name means the sword that grants victory. It's said that the light it emits contains the people's wishes.
Chaldea, The Security Organization for the Preservation of Humanity. We safeguard the future of mankind. Our wish is for the path we take to be the right one.

The magical seal mark of a certain Master.
It has the image of a gem that is filled with magical energy.
A chain that was said to have once bound the Bull of Heaven. They say that the greater the target's Divinity, the more constrictive the chain becomes.

"Engravings are a symbol of power. It is only sensible to choose me as a symbol.
Make use of this power as you like!"

A certain Master's Command Seal.
It bears the image of a small chalice.

A longsword of twilight infused with magical energy from the Age of Gods.
It can turn into a sacred sword or a demonic sword, depending on its wielder.
"Master, I will entrust my back to you. In return, should you ever come against an obstacle, I will open the path for you with this blade."

"The legendary hunter of myth, and just an overall good-looking guy who's a big hit with the ladies.

Yep, that's me. Orion the superman.
Other than the fact that I accidentally pierced the heart of a goddess, I'm the perfect love hunter...heh heh.

So don't hesitate to pair me with any of the cute Servant girls!

Oh, but that aside, don't waste your time looking up the meaning of my name, okay?"

The magical seal mark of a certain Master.
It bears the image of a flower that represents spring.
